features: SHEER LIP STAIN: Your lips deserve it all: color that stays put, a healthy sheen & comfortable wear. This non-drying lip stain imbues lips with a sheer color & a hint of shine in one step (think: more pigment than a lip balm & less bold than a lipstick).
LONG-LASTING FORMULA: E.l.f. Glossy Lip Stain's long-wear, buildable formula won’t transfer and leaves lips looking and feeling fresh. Available in 8 gorgeous shades.
UNIQUE FINISH: This lip stain has a unique gloss-to-stain finish for a sheer pop of color with a subtle gloss effect.

SKIN-LOVING INGREDIENTS: All e.l.f. products are made from skin-loving ingredients you want, minus the toxins you don’t—all at good-for-you prices. All e.l.f. products are 100% vegan, cruelty-free, and leaping bunny certified.
body.description: Your lips deserve it all: beautiful color that stays put, a healthy sheen, and comfortable wear. This lightweight, non-drying lip stain imbues lips with a sheer kiss of color and a healthy hint of shine in one step (think: more pigment than a lip balm and less bold than a lipstick). The long-wear, buildable formula won’t transfer and leaves lips looking and feeling fresh. Available in 8 gorgeous shades.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Us Your originality is our inspiration. From full-on maximalists to fresh-faced minimalists, we have a product for everyone—and every look in between. This is instant access to beauty— all the thrills with no velvet ropes. Look good and feel good—all our formulas are vegan. e.l.f. is for every eye, lip and face .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Decent lip tint oil
reviews.reviewText: Decent lip tint+oil.1. I took a 3 pics- right after applying, 30min after, 1hr later.2. This didnt stay long enough for me but I dont mind reapplying in frequently. I move my lips and talk alot so... For the price, I didnt expect much anyway so it is ok, I can work with it.3. It didnt tint my lips as I wished but still left a nice sheer of color on my natural, colorless lips. Im contented.4. Very light, minimum stickiness, gives a nice shine when you apply it. Not sticky like lip gloss.5. It dried out my lips but maybe it is just me. All the lip tints that Ive ever tried in the past, all of them dried my lips out as time went by.6. Quantity is very little but it is only $6 so it is understandable. But it is nice to carry it with me everywhere since it is very small.7. I ordered something 'mauve' and it looks exactly same as shown in picture. Love it.8. Only down side is applicator. Tiktok made me buy it and when I saw it from Tiktok, the applicator was big but the one that I got, it has a small thin regular applicator head so I had to apply it few times to cover whole my lips.9. Worth to buy it for $6

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for my Complexion: Light-med, cool w/blue undertones
reviews.reviewText: I was a bit concerned that the Berry Queen would look too purple, but also knew I needed a bit of that for my cool complexion. It's a strong color but it's controllable so I dap some off after applying and leaving for a moment.I use a little on my cheeks too when I am using on my lips. It does stain tho so blend out ASAP.I love stains most for my needs and this Elf one as been a godsend as it's not as drying as any I've used before. I also love the Power Mauve, tho I do not feel it looks the same on me as any examples I've seen. It almost looks a bit peachy and far less blue than "Mauve" should be and a little lighter than I expected (again, on me at least).My lips have a more blue/soft mauve tint naturally. Mauve-like colors are what I've learned to look for, so this Berry Queen has the right amount of blue to really complement and not look out of place.I do find this color to be buildable, but the color will wear down a bit to a more subtle "stain" and need more applications to keep bold. Worth it for me because I can't keep lip color on my lips to save my life.Side note: I'm all about French aesthetics and being as natural as possible/enhancing natural beauty. So if this is your thing, you may very much enjoy one of these stains!Reason for my 4 vs 5 stars: I like the applicator, but the packaging is so freaking wasteful. It's my primary gripe with Elf in general. If I can find a clean beauty product that works the same (even if at a somewhat higher price point) with less waste, I will switch. I think they could do better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely formula, might need to play to find the right color
reviews.reviewText: The formula is very nice. Goes on smoothly, not sticky at all. The brand also said this glossy oil would act like a lip stain and that is also true. The color remains once the gloss wears off or is blotted off via tissue.Color-wise:Pinkies Up- I was expecting this to be a cool pink, but this is has much more brown in it than the promotional photos show. Not a bad thing, just not what I was expecting!Power Mauve- this was my favorite of the pair I ordered. On me, it is more bold, and a blue-reddish hue without being RED. For someone who doesn’t wear red, this would be my alternative, and the color that is left as the stain is very pretty.For context I am fair with cool pink-red coloring

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not what I expected
reviews.reviewText: I’ve become driven to try and find other lipsticks and stains that might be superior to what I currently use. Since this product was all over social media.. I thought I’d give it a try for a more undefined lip alternative.I find it didn’t work for me. The stain effect works… it just doesn’t stay consistent all over my lips as the day goes on. And I hate to have to reapply. So… if you are fine with reapplication - it’s good. The color I chose comes out as a berry .. dark pinky/red/ purple color which is super pretty on. Natural looking with just a slight pop of vibrancy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Color stays on, Not as drying as most other lip stains.
reviews.reviewText: I bought three of these to add to one I received with Boxycharm. This color stays on, no joke. I tried removing with cold cream in an attempt to view all three colors on my lips, and it was difficult, if not impossible to remove. Love the colors as well. I find they don't dry out my lips nearly as much as other lip stains I have and like. Can't believe they're under $10. I guess some people would complain about the size, but I don't wear the same shade of lipstick everyday so I'm ok with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this lip stain to try it as I love lip stains. I have bought lip stains from high end brands like fenty beauty and rare beauty which I love but it’s expensive. This elf lip stain was affordable and lasted a few hours. It does not last whole day like some of the other brands but I like the texture and price.
El color es increíble y si deja una tinta padrisima durante el día

reviews.reviewTitle: L o v e i t
reviews.reviewText: Perfect color, size, quality, durability, this is the second one I order, can't decide on a favourite but know I will be ordering more 😉
It's tye exact color shown. The tint is very nice too. And isn't streaky for me. Good product and a good price. I will be getting again.
Hält Ewigkeiten, sieht mega aus als lipliner und hat die perfekte Farbe bin begeistert

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have super sensitive lips that are easily irritated by most lipsticks, glosses, etc- I think a combination of scent and pigment tends to set my lips off. But not with these. They’re scent-free and light with a great color pay off. The Spicy Sienna colour is lovely. It stains the lips in minutes to a nice though less vibrant natural but totally wearable pink that goes well even with a darker natural lip tone. Think “your lips but better.” Once your lips are stained, you’re able to use lip balm over it. The only downside is that it doesn’t last very long. I don’t think I used it for up to a month before it was finished.
